pages.title: Heat Sink
pages.text: The <item>Heat Sink/$ is a way of venting heat (or cold) rapidly.$(br2)They can be configured with a $(l:essentials/wrench)wrench/$ to adjust the loss rate.$(br2)It will move the temperature towards the biome temperature at the set constant rate.$(br2)

If the <em>Create mod/$ installed, the <item>heat sink/$ can be used as a heat source for the Create boiler, allowing using Crossroads heat to produce Create rotary power.$(br2)The strength of the heat sink as a boiler heat source depends on the heat sink temperature and on the loss rate. For 'warm' heat (like fire), needs to be above 50°C and draining at least 5°C/t. For 'burning' heat (like a blaze burner with fuel), needs to be above 100°C and draining at least 10°C/t. For 'blazing' heat (like a blaze burner with fuel and blaze cake), needs to be above 5000°C and draining at least 25°C/t.$(br2)
